short_summary: X86 servers with maintenance and support
description: X86 servers with maintenance and support for Shared Services Canada
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## X86 Servers with Maintenance and Support for Shared Services Canada

### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number**: BPM019448/23670
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-10-16T14:00:00
* **Tender Status**: Expiring
* **GSIN**: N7025 (ADP Input-Output and Storage Devices)
* **Trade Agreements**: This tender is open to contractors registered under the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.
* **Regions of Opportunity**: This tender is open to contractors within Canada.
* **Regions of Delivery**: The servers will be delivered to Ontario (except National Capital Region).

### Description of Goods and Services

Shared Services Canada is seeking bids for the supply of X86 servers, as well as ongoing maintenance and support services.

### Amendment History

This tender has undergone several amendments to address supplier queries and update the terms and conditions of the contract. The amendments can be accessed through the SSC Procurement Portal.

### Registration and Bidding Process

Suppliers can register to bid on this tender through the SSC Procurement Portal. To register, please follow the link: https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login.

Note that this tender has expired and is no longer valid. Therefore, the closing date is outdated. However, I will keep all other necessary information. Please let me know if I can make further adjustments. 

Your advice will be welcome. Thanks for your attention.  Edgar.
